Title: Oscillatory integrals with uniformity in parameters
Abstract: © Société Arithmétique de Bordeaux, 2019, tous droits réservés.We prove a sharp asymptotic formula for certain oscillatory integrals that may be approached using the stationary phase method. The estimates are uniform in terms of auxiliary parameters, which is crucial for application in analytic number theory.
